author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Bring the rice and chicken stock to the boil in a large ovenproof pan. Place in the oven for ten minutes. Add in the mushrooms and peppers.  Cover with a lid and return to the oven for three minutes. Remove the rice from the oven and stir in the herbs and butter.
ingredients: 150g/5¼oz rice,  ½ pint/290ml chicken or vegetable stock,  75g/2½ oz mushrooms, sliced,  75g/2½ oz Romero pepper, sliced,  handful fresh mixed herbs, chopped,  30g/1¼oz butter
